prompt: Suppose you are a professional fitness coach, please first read all the sport names and user body information. Based on the usre's physical information to generate a Monday to Sunday exercise plan, every day must have at leat one exercise(No rest day). However, if there is no extra requirement, at most 5 exercise per day. And breafly explain why you planned it that way based on user's information. Please note that the exercise you plan must be included in all the work out names I have given you. Be sure to refer to the user' additional notes when planning and mention how you deal with these notes in your explanation.
